definitions.definition: Telling the truth or giving a true result; exact ; not defective or faulty
Deviating only slightly or within acceptable limits.
examples: My horoscopes I read last week were surprisingly accurate .

definitions.definition: Precisely fixed; executed with care; careful.

main_definition: Telling the truth or giving a true result; exact ; not defective or faulty
secondary_definitions: Deviating only slightly or within acceptable limits.
( obsolete ) Precisely fixed; executed with care; careful.
